alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 10 at 5:26AM MDT until October 10 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility below a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range, Eastern Black Range Foothills and Sierra County Lakes Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may change quickly.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
